name: Super Rossi
description:
The Super Rossi minigame has as its main character a lumberjack, called Rossi, who has to go through 3 completely opposite worlds to find the way to freedom, after entering it randomly and unconsciously.

The 3 worlds  Purgatory

Initially the character finds himself in a world composed of gooba, carnivorous plants and mushrooms. They are obstacles that he must overcome thanks to his remarkable jump, before reaching the flag and entering the castle to venture into the second world.

Hell

After purgatory, unfortunately our lumberjack does not immediately reach heaven, but, on the contrary, appears in a world that immediately shows its great depth from a black background and from the lava that rises and burns the surrounding earth, to which the character must stand very careful.

Heaven

Once in heaven, the main objective of the character is to avoid falling into the void and use the clouds and giant mushrooms to climb higher and higher in the sky and find the castle and finally escape from the mysterious world.
